short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminding you of the ever-flowing nature of time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A unique age-tracking extension displaying your age in a float, reminding you of the ever-flowing nature of time. This subtle pulse serves as a constant motivator, urging you to make the most of each moment and strive for your goals. Embrace time's rhythm with ChronoPulse.
